程序包 mint.mvc.core

Main package of WebWind that contains useful web components.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Config
    Wrapper interface for ServletConfig and FilterConfig.
    InterceptorChain
    Holds all interceptors as a chain.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    ActionContext
    Holds all Servlet objects in ThreadLocal.
    BilidInArgumentInfo
    组织内置参数的描素信息 可以更具typeCode判断参数的类型,typeCode的存在是为了在参数初始化时判断更加快捷
    0:HttpServletRequest
    1:HttpServletResponse
    2:HttpSession
    3:Cookie[]
    4:Cookie
    Interceptor
    Intercept action's execution like servlet Filter, but interceptors are configured and managed by IoC container.
    ServiceServlet
    DispatcherServlet must be mapped to root URL "/".
